ovdesc.p: This file holds a consolidated total of all debit and credit movements for the combination of consol key, asset type, session number and booking date. A close of business process will simply update the CRB base with these consolidated figures.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Local equivalent of the credit movement.
